price: Ту их умор неће дотицати, они одатле никада неће да буду изведени.
arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabun wamā hum min'hā bimukh'rajīna
